  sgcool_label_text: He was out there all alone riding the monsoon waves like a champ harkens back to a time when the artist’s brother was still alive – during a holiday to Phuket. The wave is a recurring motif that features in numerous of Dusadee’s sculptures and drawings. Stemming from how this memorable visit was during the monsoon season
 the choppy conditions of the sea left a deep impression on Dusadee. Furthermore
 since the primary purpose of the visit to Phuket was for surfing
 Dusadee had watched his brother conquer these towering waves with both trepidation and pride – the flaccid penis affixed to the sculpture sheds light on the fear that the artist experienced as he watched his brother.

metadata.title_text: He Was Out There All Alone Riding The Monsoon Waves Like A Champ
metadata.physical_appearance: This sculpture is composed of black cylindrical rods that have been stuck onto each other. Notably, a white (limp) phallus has been attaced to the central rod of the sculpture.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: He was out there all alone riding the monsoon waves like a champ harkens back to a time when the artist’s brother was still alive – during a holiday to Phuket. The wave is a recurring motif that features in numerous of Dusadee’s sculptures and drawings. Stemming from how this memorable visit was during the monsoon season, the choppy conditions of the sea left a deep impression on Dusadee. Furthermore, since the primary purpose of the visit to Phuket was for surfing, Dusadee had watched his brother conquer these towering waves with both trepidation and pride – the flaccid penis affixed to the sculpture sheds light on the fear that the artist experienced as he watched his brother.
